arts.ttl: Report: Liverpool move on to new midfield target after Martin Zubimendi rejection
arts.sum: Liverpool have started the season well in all the competitions. Under the leadership of new manager Arne Slot, the Reds have done well in the Premier League, Champions League and the EFL Cup. arts.ttl: Chelsea boss welcomes ‘nice problem’ ahead of Brighton clash
arts.sum: CHelsea manager Enzo Maresca says it’s a “nice problem” to have so many attacking players in form ahead of their Premier League meeting with Brighton this weekend.
